name: Hyperwave DEMO
description:
This was the final project that I worked on for college last year. I doubt I'll ever finish this but I'm still pretty happy with how it turned out.

Hyperwave is a Sci-fi run and gun game, telling the story of an Alien planet invaded by Humans who are capturing the inhabitants to bring home for experimentation on Earth. Join the Resistance and fight the humans as three unique Aliens, with different weapons and playstyles!
